title: list of champions that have not had a skin since 2014 (Updated!)
body:
CHAMPIONS THAT ARE **HIGHLIGHTED** ARE FROM BEFORE 2014 /  ARE EXPECTED TO GET A MAJOR CHANGE SOON / HAVENT GOTTEN A SKIN SINCE A MAJOR CHANGE (aka champs that need a skin bad)

DISCLAIMER: THIS POST IS FROM **9-16-15**

I DID NOT COPY AND PASTE THIS FROM SOME WEBSITE, I ACTUALLY SPENT ABOUT 2.5 HOURS INTO THIS SO PLEASE UPVOTE :){{item:2054}}

replies.body: This was much easier to read. Although I'd advocate taking Sion off the list, since he got a total VU and all skins were updated. Probably Tristana too.
True but a VU is not a new skin therefore Sion and Tristana should remain

I'll edit the list, but it was just based off his list.

Added champions that are being reworked and had visual/gameplay updates

I think  Legendary on {{champion:131}} ..Diana is most needed

{{champion:238}} needs another one more than any on your list. {{champion:222}} and {{champion:429}} (championship is too generic)

Imo Azir should have a new skin, he was insanely popular recently up until 5.16/5.17 and is still viable.. and he may be the only (?) champion that still only has ONE single skin from release. Tbh I don't see how that's fair considering Ashe/Annie/Teemo/Ryze/Rene have at least 5+. Also Kha'zix has one from release as well

Dunno if i understand you correct Kha'zix has mecha and guardian of the sands,meaning that he has 2 skins already.
Also Kalista didn't get a second skin too.(same goes for bard and Tahm kench,but they were only released this year,so its understandable.

I guess Azir might get a harrowing skin(necromancer azir).

Tbh I don't see how that's fair considering Ashe/Annie/Teemo/Ryze/Rene have at least 5+. Also Kha'zix has one from release as well

I've definitely seen a couple of good ideas for {{champion:268}} . He was on my list too.
Zed just got a project skin. He won't get another for some time.
Cassiopeia did not receive a skin last yearr, her last skin was in 2013 ignorant.

;-; I only copied his list, I just added the pictures and organized them by date, go easy on me, I'll edit my list tho for cass.

Let me know if I missed anything else.

Kassawin pls!
Project would've been so awesome.

I think that among the futuristic skin lines, Headhunter is a better fit to Kassadin.

After all, the man already has a wrist blade and a respirator. A Headhunter Kassadin with a shoulder cannon for his Q would be very nice.

Don't care about the 2014 skins, but everything before that is shameful.

Before looking at your list, I actually forgot that {{champion:85}} existed.

If you count Chroma packs, it'll knock a few off the list. They're skins too... generic recolorings but that's how most skins were back in the day. Recent chroma packs: {{champion:51}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:25}}
Chroma packs doesnt count

Imo Kha'zix & Azir should have a new skin, Azir was insanely popular recently up until 5.16/5.17 and is still viable.. and they may be the only (?) champions that still only have ONE single skin from release. Tbh I don't see how that's fair considering Ashe/Annie/Teemo/Ryze/Rene have at least 5+. {{champion:268}}  {{champion:121}}
The bug already has a Guardian of the Sands skin, which is pretty good.

To be fair Ryze did get the triumphant skin this season.

Good list. Would be nice to also see how many skins each champ has (Champs with fewer skins should get higher priority.)

>
> To be fair Ryze did get the triumphant skin this season.

...That's not a new skin, lol.
That skins been out since like 2010 O.o?
Actually Triumphant Ryze has been in the game for a long and is only available to those who win official competition matches. The skin was previously known as "Champion" and "Trophy".
I will never complain about a lack of Swain skins, simply because of Tyrant.
Tyrant Swain is an amazing skin, I feel so fancy every time I play Swain.
Cassiopeia's last skin was in 2013

{{champion:51}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:68}}{{champion:98}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:112}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:143}}

Any of these champions can and will receive a new skin eventually. They don't do it based on popularity, they do this based on skin themes and price ranges. Having said that, they do try to prioritize champions who haven't had a skin in a while, but that doesn't mean champions like Ezreal will never receive a new skin until years have passed.

Ezreal needs either a particle update or a skin that changes particles
Or pfire updated
Corki got his Fnatic skin just less than a year ago.

Poor {{champion:85}} . I sure hope he gets a new skin soon!

He's long overdue for a Blood Moon skin akin to his ninja allies Shen and Akali.
yasuo hasnt gotten a skin since 2014 either.
project?
nocturne is basicly a big black thing how hard is it to change his colour like with zac like wtf

I understand there are a lot of champions in this game, but it was an eye opener to see some have not even received a skin in **four years**.

That is just insane. Rito plz, show these champions some love and stop making Teemo skins for the love of god.

Instead of years since a skin, we should just count it in the amount of Teemo skins released. There have been four Teemo skins released since 2011, if that's not a slap in the face I don't know what is.
Project Yasuo actually came out just a little over a year ago (Sept 1st 2014).
did arctic ops kennen really come out in 2011?

> [{quoted}](name=ComannderShepard,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=oMkWl7OL,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2015-09-17T07:18:34.989+0000)
>
> did arctic ops kennen really come out in 2011?

Edit:  And I swear Brand got his zombie legendary skin after 2012
You're being a bit generous with 2014. One year isn't long enough for a champion to be needing a skin unless it's a chroma pack or a 750 tier non-team skin.
Wait, it's been 3 years since Zombie Brand already?
Man kassadin needs a new skin badly and Sion too... How can they let something like this happen... ☹
{{champion:38}}  main here since s2 :'( i cri everytime
You put on Zyra twice. Otherwise good post. I bet many of the 2014 champs are getting skins soon. And a bunch of these champions are also getting relaunches and reworks. +1
Most of these champs already have a dick ton of skins.
my ass wants more diana, malzahar, and nocturne skins. rito Help
{{champion:69}} has not had skin since february 2013**** when did she get a skin last year? are you crazy? you know nothing. How many do you have wrong in there?
I didnt approve of this, simply beause you only went to just 2014. That's literally only a year ago. Of course theres going to be a ton! There is a post showing some from back to 2011! (Kass, Kennen)

A few things, firstly, I really like the way you organized it in alphabetical order, it makes it so much easier to go through.

And skins are not made based on how long certain champs have gotten one.  Skin design goes something like this:

"Hey, we should add in a chef skin."
"Awesome, which champion would work well with that theme?"

Most importantly, just look at which order the idea was presented.  Theme, then champion.

I'm not saying it's a right or wrong thing to do, and Riot has had exceptions, obviously, I'm just saying this is how the process usually works.
I think kayle is over due for a good skin.
